competition_summary.context: competition in serving individual investors spans brokerage, wealth management, and asset management firms, as well as banks, trust companies, financial technology companies, and retirement service providers. In the Advisor Services arena, we compete with institutional custodians, wirehouses, regional and independent broker-dealers, banks, and trust companies. Across both segments, our key competitive advantages are: • Scale and Size of the Business – As one of the largest investment services fi
